At a location within range, you create the shining, powerful, and intimidating image of your deity. Each creature within 40ft of this point that can see the image must make a Presence (Save) check. On failure, the creature takes 2d10 radiant damage.
    If the creature has stolen something, injured another creature, or had rolled a Presence (Deception) or Presence (Intimidation) check within the last 24 hours, the creature also takes an additional 2d10 radiant damage and becomes @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.UK95BQ45TGSD5Q3V]{Frightened} for the duration.
    On success in either situation, the creature takes half damage and is not frightened.
